body: Momo being a Third-wheeler made her the Best Girl ever in the history of Harem orientate Stories. / @NejiHyuga2 One of my favorite line quote from a otherwise another Legendary grade Story if not for the Ending in my list: "A MONSTER COCKS" - "Lotte no Omocha" Manga.
This is the RITO I wanted to see in the Anime. The hero we need but not the one we deserve.

to the comment under me about ritos cock
yeah you're probably right but like what would you expect
Rito with a big dick is basically canon judging from the reactions of the girls who had accidentally seen his bare dick throughout the series.
